mapper.select: select ua.name , sp.policy_title , l.* from license l, user_admin ua , subscription_policy sp where l.user_admin_no = ua.no and l.policy_no = sp.no;

select ua.name , sp.policy_title , sp.standard, ol.reg_date, ol.total_price, ol.month_payment, l.* from license l, user_admin ua , subscription_policy sp ,order_list ol where l.user_admin_no = ua.no and l.policy_no = sp.no and l.order_no = ol.no and l.no = #{no};
mapper.insert: insert into subscription_cancel (license_no, order_no , user_admin_no ) values(#{no}, #{order_no}, #{user_admin_no});
mapper.update: update license set activation = 'C', end_date = TO_TIMESTAMP(#{end_date}, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') where no=#{no} ;
